name: Covus
tag_list: prosiebensat-1, internet, games, download, venture-capital, seed-capital, europe, germany
overview: Covus is a group of Internet Companys. Beside operating own properties the group is investing seed capital in young Internet brands. Best known product is Europes leading browser games brand “Browsergames.de, .com, etc.” run by Covus Games. Covus Pro is the tech- and download publishing arm of the group. Freemium is developing and marketing own Freeware products. Covus has federated its marketing and investing operations with ProsiebenSat1, one of Europes leading TV Company.
